definition: to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a constant pressure deflation valve.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种定压放气阀。

sentences.english: Should rest above for 30 seconds after deflating, again measures.
sentences.chinese: 应在放气后休息30秒以上，再测一遍。

sentences.english: The design has improved the connection and appearance of the stable-pressure release valve and made it easier to operate.
sentences.chinese: 设计改进了定压放气阀连接及外型，变得更容易操作。

sentences.english: At the end of the blowoff period, a reverse procedure should be used.
sentences.chinese: 在放气将要结束时，在进行相反的操作。

sentences.english: Unique film valves, blowpipe inflatable, inflatable deflated lets you more easily.
sentences.chinese: 独特的薄膜阀门，吹管吹气，让您充气放气更轻松。

sentences.english: Analyzes the detonation factors and gasbleeding effect of the super-charged gasoline engine.
sentences.chinese: 试验分析了增压汽油机的致爆因素及放气效应。

sentences.english: A degassing liquid tube is also arranged on the bicycle frame.
sentences.chinese: 车架上还具有放气液管。

sentences.english: The utility model is folded to store after deflated by an exhaust valve of the air chamber.
sentences.chinese: 经气室排气阀放气后便可折叠收藏。

sentences.english: If the steam needs quick deflating, the deflation valve stem can be pressed to deflate the steam thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 如急于放气可压住放气阀杆把蒸汽放净。

sentences.english: If the steam needs quick deflating, the deflation valve stem can be pressed to deflate the steam thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 如急于放气可压住放气阀杆把蒸汽放净。

sentences.english: The outgassing rate of GFRP was measured at different temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 测量了不同温度下玻璃钢试样的放气速率。

sentences.english: After decompression operation is over, fast deflation will break through gauge pressure.
sentences.chinese: 减压操作结束后，放气太快，使压力计冲破。

sentences.english: Vent points shall be closed when test media overflow from vent points continually.
sentences.chinese: 当试验介质自放气阀连续流出时，关闭放气阀。

sentences.english: Vent points shall be closed when test media overflow from vent points continually.
sentences.chinese: 当试验介质自放气阀连续流出时，关闭放气阀。
